Talk_1103:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>Has this guy never heard of my husband?<sp:5:1:0>
There's no way.<sp:0:4:0>You won't find a more stylish man than him
anywhere in Hyrule. Only my guy can pull off
a Cece outfit without looking overdressed.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1104:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Urrrgh... <sp:5:1:0>Oh, hi.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I've seen you before, right? Right...
You're a regular with us. <sp:5:0:0>One of those
fashion-obsessed Cece fans too.<sp:0:4:0>I mean, in my book, anyone who shows
up more than once counts as a regular.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>Anyway, you know the drill. My hubby's
the dyer around here, not me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c01>All this activity is getting to be a problem. <sp:5:1:0>I mean,
I'm grateful to Cece that our shop has taken off like
this, <sp:5:0:0>but every day is so exhausting now.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>*yawn*<sp:5:1:0>...<sp:5:0:0>Oh! <sp:5:2:0>Sorry 'bout that.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Right, so...<sp:5:0:0>you're a new customer or
something, yeah?<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>Well, I don't do the dyeing around here.

I'm grateful to Cece that our shop has taken off like
this, <sp:5:0:0>but every day is so exhausting now.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
